item.title: Britain forecast to reach peak gasoline this year in landmark moment for electric vehicles
item.description: Britain is forecast to hit "peak petrol" in 2024, according to a new report, with EVs on track to assume a much bigger share of the country's car mark...

item.title: South Korean President Yoon faces impeachment: How did we get here?
item.description: South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol is facing impeachment by parliament after he declared martial law only to revoke it 6 hours later amid immense ba...

item.title: Asia-Pacific markets trade mixed amid global political chaos; bitcoin crosses $100,000
item.description: Investors will continue to monitor the political situation in South Korea after lawmakers in the country filed a motion to impeach President Yoon.

item.title: Bitcoin tops $100,000 as monster 2024 rally reaches new heights
item.description: Bitcoin had been widely expected to reach $100,000 since the U.S. presidential election but investors sent it to this mark much sooner than expected.

item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson fatally shot in New York in targeted attack
item.description: Thompson, who led the largest private insurer in the U.S., was set to attend UnitedHealth Group's investor day, which the company canceled.
